thread.title: Vegas taxi firm ordered to pay $445K discrimination fine
thread.title_full: Vegas taxi firm ordered to pay $445K discrimination fine

title: Vegas taxi firm ordered to pay $445K discrimination fine
text:
Published By: Las Vegas RJ - Today 
The owners of Southern Nevada's second-largest taxi company will pay a $445,000 fine to settle a discrimination suit....
